about_the_game:
As the solo developer behind Relentless Dark, this project has been a labor of love, and I’m so excited to finally share my passion with the world. Your support and feedback mean EVERYTHING to me as I yearn to create the most intense and terrifying zombie horde experience imaginable. Whether you want to follow the development, contribute ideas, or simply be part of the community, I’d love for you to join me as I move forward, one small step at a time.

Relentless Dark is designed to be a pulse-pounding, 4-player cooperative zombie horde game, where teamwork and instinct are pushed to their absolute limits. With a haunting atmosphere, brutal combat, and an unforgiving AI, every moment will feel like a fight for survival. Can you and your friends endure the relentless onslaught, or will the darkness swallow you whole?

Oh also this is my first game, wish me luck!

content_descriptors.notes: Relentless Dark contains mature content primarily in the form of graphic violence and intense gore. Players will face hordes of zombies and monsters, with frequent depictions of dismemberment, blood splatter, and brutal combat. The game involves shooting and combat against grotesque enemies, with a focus on survival in a dark, oppressive atmosphere. There are no depictions of sexual acts, drug use, or self-harm in the game, but the level of violence may not be suitable for all audiences. Viewer discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD 5 1600 (equivalent or higher)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500 (equivalent or higher)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700XT / Intel Arc A750 (equivalent or higher)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
